scripts.deev: pnpm build & nx watch --projects=@gladia/api --includeDependencies -- pnpm build
scripts.build: pnpm --filter "@gladia/api" schema:generate && openapi -i ./api.json -o ./src -c fetch --name Gladia --useUnionTypes --useOptions && prettier --write ./src && tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --clean
